name: Color Power Mixer! - Free
description:
Best known from radio and TV!
We have styled the classics into brand new top apps!
With this app... it fun to play games again!

A new ingenious Casual Swap 3 game. Can you get all the diamonds? This classic saga game is completely filled with lots levels with big fun! Get it now! Change the colors and try this casual game now.
Yes, it is Free!
